Personal Profile

I am an engineer who loves problem-solving; determining the problem and finding the solutions. I am self-motivated and really efficient at my work after I got a hitch about the problem. I like talking and doing work as a team. A team provides better quality of the software and increases the work motivation. The feeling of improving is really important to me.

Work Experience

Software Engineer at Gofore OY - Helsinki, Finland

June 2016 - May 2017

I was working as IT-consultant at Finnish Institute of Occupational Health (FIOH). I was the main developer of the Solmu project. Solmu is a self-assessment questionnaire, for measuring the work ability and functional capacity of the participants. The work requires different web-technologies.

Part-time Teacher at Aalto University - Espoo, Finland

January 2013 - June 2016

I worked as a part-time teacher in Basic C-programming, Data structures and algorithms and C++ programming -courses. The work included active teaching during the exercise sessions, keepping lectures, programming projectsâ€™ guiding and evaluation, and grading the final exams. The work required good communication skills and deep understanding of C and C++ programming languages.

Software Specialist at Futurice Oy - Helsinki, Finland

May 2015 - August 2015

I worked as IT consultant at Sanoma Oy. Basically, I was responsible of the new Android and Windows Phone Iltasanomat news -applications development during the summer. I improved the view and information gathering properties of the software. The work was challenging and extended my insights of the design and marketing. The customer was really satisfied about my work and offered to me extended working opportunity.
